Create a public profile on Nostr. Choose any Display Name and say something about yourself. You can easily change these things later.
Tells us about your interests and we will create your initial follow list:
We followed %1$s Nostr accounts based on the interests you selected.
We will use this info to create your Nostr account. If you wish to make any changes, you can always do so in your profile settings.
Your Nostr key is available in your Account Settings.
Unable to upload photo. Please try again.
Something went wrong while creating your account. Please try again.
Nostr is much more\nfun with ZAPS!
Zaps are small payments that Nostr users send to each other. You can zap a note instead of hitting the like button.
Activate your Primal Wallet to participate in the Nostr zapping economy and earn money for the awesome content you publish!
Enter your Nostr key to sign in:
Enter your Nostr key to sign in:
Please enter a valid Nostr key,\nstarting with “nsec”:
If you didn\'t save your private key, it will be irretrievably lost. Do you really want to sign out?
The Primal OG tier was created to recognize those users who signed up to Primal Premium in the first year.
Subscribe to Primal Premium to get:
Start by reserving your Primal Name:

Your Primal Premium subscription has expired.\nYou can renew it below:
The Legend tier was created to recognize users who have made a significant\ncontribution to Primal.
Primal Premium subscription never expires for legends.
Get 100GB of Primal Premium media storage.
Pick the color of your verified badge and set a custom ring around your avatar.
We’ll never forget our biggest supporters. People like you will help Nostr succeed.
Pay this on-chain invoice to complete your purchase. Your legendary status will be active immediately.
You are now a Primal Legend
Unable to get payment instructions. Please try again.
Are you sure you want to delete this media file? Any notes referencing this media file will look broken.

The Primal Premium relay is a high-performance Nostr relay that only accepts content from Primal Premium users. Posting to this relay improves your visibility on the Nostr network because it guarantees high signal and lack of spam to any Nostr user that reads from it.
Update your contact list based on the state from %1$s (%2$s of follows)?
Failed to recover contact list. Please try again.
Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period, so you can continue enjoying premium features until then. No further charges will be made after that date.
Oops! Looks like someone just snatched that name. Please try another one!
Unable to cancel the subscription. Please check if you are logged in with your Google Account and try again.
Unable to cancel the subscription. Please check your connection and try again.
We were unable to process your subscription purchase. Please reach out to Primal Support.
Be a part of the Nostr revolution and help us continue building for this ecosystem.
Play Store reviews really help improve the visibility of Nostr apps at this early stage.
Extend your existing subscription to gain peace of mind and help fund Primal.
Donate $1.000 or more to gain permanent membership and exclusive perks!
Don’t want to stand out?\nIf you disable the custom badge and avatar ring,\nyour profile will look like any other profile on Primal.

Anyone on Nostr can find you via your public key. Feel free to share anywhere.
This key fully controls your Nostr account. Don’t share it with anyone. Only copy this key to store it securely or to login to another Nostr app.
Alternatively you can connect to an external lightning wallet via Nostr Wallet Connect
You can change your Nostr Lightning Address (for receiving zaps) in your
Primal Wallet is a transactional wallet, designed for handling small amounts. We recommend self custody for larger amounts.
You can choose to hide small transactions to avoid spam in your transaction list
Open the wallet when Primal starts

Automatically set dark theme based on your device Display settings.
Start playing videos automatically as you scroll the feed. Turn this off to use less network data.
Switch off to disable animated avatars in feeds. Profile will continue to show the full version.
Maximize screen real estate by hiding app header & footer as you scroll down the feed.

Are you sure you want to restore default caching service?
Unable to add relay. Please try again in few moments.
When enabled, your IP address will be visible to the caching service, but not to relays. Your content will be published to your specified relays using the caching service as a proxy.
Single tap zaps send the default amount & message. Configure custom zap presets below:

All reports posted will be publicly visible.

You need to activate your wallet

Activating your wallet is easy!\nWe just need a few details below. This info will not be shared publicly.
Your activation code was sent to %1$s. You may need to check your Junk or Spam folder.
Your wallet has been activated. Your new Nostr lightning address is:
Unable to connect to the Google Play Store services. Please try again.

Type or paste the recipient’s lightning address or an invoice.
Cannot make payment. %1$s doesn’t have a lightning address set.
Please enter a valid lightning address or an invoice.
Amount too small for an on-chain transaction.

Bitcoin mining fees are small payments made by users to compensate the network of computers that process and verify Bitcoin transactions. These fees help prioritize your transaction, ensuring it gets added to the blockchain quickly. They also support the overall security and maintenance of the Bitcoin network.
Unable to add details. Please try again in few moments.
Primal needs access to your camera to scan QR codes.
Toggle between dark and light mode
